Adrielle_18.context: NodeContext: it hurts her pride to beg but she will do it if it means keeping her research safe

Adrielle_38.speaker: Adrielle
Adrielle_38.text: Ethel's darkest secret - a way to burn that witch for good. No more tricks, no more comebacks.

Adrielle_3.speaker: Player
Adrielle_3.text: Tell me and I'll kill Ethel - I promise.

Adrielle_90.speaker: Adrielle
Adrielle_90.text: No, it cannot die with me! I discovered Ethel's darkest secret - a way to burn that witch for good. No more tricks, no more comebacks.

Adrielle_100.speaker: Adrielle
Adrielle_100.text: Jatlo took off like the fiends of the Nine Hells were on his tail...

AD_MaskedVictim1_SawHagMaskEquipped_0.speaker: Mask of Regret
AD_MaskedVictim1_SawHagMaskEquipped_0.text: Ah, come on. I don't need to see that thing.
AD_MaskedVictim1_SawHagMaskEquipped_0.context: NodeContext: player has shown up wearing a hag mask. Annoyed.

AD_MaskedVictim1_SawHagMaskEquipped_1.speaker: Mask of Regret
AD_MaskedVictim1_SawHagMaskEquipped_1.text: Ethel is the last thing I need to think about.
AD_MaskedVictim1_SawHagMaskEquipped_1.context: NodeContext: player has shown up wearing a hag mask. Annoyed.

AD_MaskedVictim1_SawHagMaskEquipped_2.speaker: Mask of Regret
AD_MaskedVictim1_SawHagMaskEquipped_2.text: Mate, my head pounds with that mask around. How can you stand it?
AD_MaskedVictim1_SawHagMaskEquipped_2.context: NodeContext: player has shown up wearing a hag mask. Annoyed.

AD_MaskedVictim1_Tired_0.speaker: Mask of Regret
AD_MaskedVictim1_Tired_0.text: You survived a hag once - you can't be broken. You won't.
AD_MaskedVictim1_Tired_0.context: NodeContext: trying to give herself a pep talk. Stressed, frustrated and tired

AD_MaskedVictim1_Tired_1.speaker: Mask of Regret
AD_MaskedVictim1_Tired_1.text: You're not letting the hag win - not a chance.
AD_MaskedVictim1_Tired_1.context: NodeContext: trying to give herself a pep talk. Stressed, frustrated and tired

AD_MaskedVictim1_Tired_2.speaker: Mask of Regret
AD_MaskedVictim1_Tired_2.text: Come on - keep it together. You've got this.
AD_MaskedVictim1_Tired_2.context: NodeContext: trying to give herself a pep talk. Stressed, frustrated and tired

AD_General_Kleidunn_0.speaker: Kled
AD_General_Kleidunn_0.text: Must get food for Lady Mayrina - maybe some tasty hay.
AD_General_Kleidunn_0.context: NodeContext: talking to himself, trying to find some way to be helpful

AD_General_Kleidunn_1.speaker: Kled
AD_General_Kleidunn_1.text: Lady Mayrina will be all right. She's is strong, and smart, and amazing.
AD_General_Kleidunn_1.context: NodeContext: talking to himself, trying to reassure himself

AD_General_Kleidunn_2.speaker: Kled
AD_General_Kleidunn_2.text: The hag's magic is strong. What if Lady Mayrina can't turn back?

AD_General_Kleidunn_3.speaker: Kled
AD_General_Kleidunn_3.text: It's just a doll - not big. Not scary. Not like the hag.
AD_General_Kleidunn_3.context: NodeContext: talking to himself, trying not to freak out but clearly terrified

AD_General_Kleidunn_4.speaker: Kled
AD_General_Kleidunn_4.text: Don't be scared, Kled - find the doll.
AD_General_Kleidunn_4.context: NodeContext: talking to himself, trying not to freak out but clearly terrified

AD_General_Kleidunn_5.speaker: Kled
AD_General_Kleidunn_5.text: The hag! No - Kled can't panic. Kled must find the doll.
AD_General_Kleidunn_5.context: NodeContext: talking to himself, trying not to freak out but clearly terrified

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_5.speaker: Jatlo
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_5.text: The doll is just the beginning - we need to go.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_15.speaker: Adrielle
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_15.text: And have the doll follow us? No - I'll not endanger innocents.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_8.speaker: Adrielle
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_8.text: Helm is on our side - have faith.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_7.speaker: Jatlo
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_7.text: Faith does little good against a hag.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_0.speaker: Kled
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_0.text: Kled heard that salt can stop hag magic?

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_27.speaker: Jatlo
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_27.text: That's a childish superstition, you half-wit.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_13.speaker: Jatlo
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_13.text: It's vanished - damn this dance. The hag is toying with us.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_19.speaker: Adrielle
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_19.text: The doll keeps teleporting - we need to find a way to stop it.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_24.speaker: Kled
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_24.text: Kled hates the doll. Kled wants it gone.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_3.speaker: Jatlo
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_3.text: Gods give me strength - get a hold of yourself!

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_12.speaker: Adrielle
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_12.text: You are not a half-wit - you're clever and valiant. And I am glad to call you friend.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_23.speaker: Mask of Regret
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_23.text: Bloody lay off, dragonborn. We've a hag after us - we don't need your bellyaching, too.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_11.speaker: Jatlo
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_11.text: We may as well paint targets on our foreheads and call out for the hag.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_22.speaker: Jatlo
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_22.text: The hag could arrive at any moment - we need to go.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_2.speaker: Adrielle
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_2.text: And leave our leader, the one who saved us, behind? No - my honour won't allow it.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_25.speaker: Kled
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_25.text: What was that? Kled heard a noise!

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_26.speaker: Mask of Regret
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_26.text: Calm down, mate. The cleric has this place secured.

AD_AmbientGroupConversation_9.speaker: Jatlo
AD_AmbientGroupConversation_9.text: Paranoia is just the beginning, you know.

HagSpy_Aggroed_6.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HagSurvivors_HagSpy
HagSpy_Aggroed_6.text: You removed my hex? Ah, that's annoying.

HagSpy_Aggroed_15.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HagSurvivors_HagSpy
HagSpy_Aggroed_15.text: I wanted to play a little longer, Auntie likes her toys broken. She's not going to be happy I had to get my hands dirty.

HagSpy_Aggroed_20.speaker: Player
HagSpy_Aggroed_20.text: Tell me who you are - now!

HagSpy_Aggroed_17.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HagSurvivors_HagSpy
HagSpy_Aggroed_17.text: I don't matter. Only Auntie does.

HagSpy_Aggroed_14.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HagSurvivors_HagSpy
HagSpy_Aggroed_14.text: How cute - I see why Auntie has her eye on you.

HagSpy_Aggroed_4.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HagSurvivors_HagSpy
HagSpy_Aggroed_4.text: I know you wish to hurt Auntie Ethel. I know the book is here. I will die before I let you touch a hair on her head.

HagSpy_Aggroed_13.speaker: Player
HagSpy_Aggroed_13.text: True cruelty rules with fear alone. Pathetic the hag had to charm you.

HagSpy_Aggroed_3.speaker: Player
HagSpy_Aggroed_3.text: The hag charmed you. You don't know what you're saying.

HagSpy_Aggroed_21.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HagSurvivors_HagSpy
HagSpy_Aggroed_21.text: Hah! You have no idea how wrong you are. I have worshipped her for decades past, and will for decades more.

HagSpy_Aggroed_16.speaker: Player
HagSpy_Aggroed_16.text: I'm sorry you lived the slave of such evil.

HagSpy_Aggroed_8.speaker: Player
HagSpy_Aggroed_8.text: Nicely played - but it ends here.

HagSpy_Aggroed_23.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HagSurvivors_HagSpy
HagSpy_Aggroed_23.text: Please - Auntie has gifted me idiots twice your size to feast on. You are a mere appetiser.

HagSpy_Aggroed_11.speaker: Player
HagSpy_Aggroed_11.text: I don't know anything about this book. I have nothing to do with this.

HagSpy_Aggroed_10.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HagSurvivors_HagSpy
HagSpy_Aggroed_10.text: Too bad - you shall be the dessert to my main course. HAH!

HagSpy_Aggroed_5.speaker: Player
HagSpy_Aggroed_5.text: And I know ten ways to kill you before you can blink. We doing this or not?

HagSpy_Aggroed_0.speaker: Player
HagSpy_Aggroed_0.text: You serve a perversion of nature. End this now, before I end you.

HagSpy_Aggroed_19.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HagSurvivors_HagSpy
HagSpy_Aggroed_19.text: The others I will leave to rot in this house, but you? I will gift Auntie your corpse - wrapped in your own intestines.

HagSpy_Aggroed_2.speaker: Player
HagSpy_Aggroed_2.text: You are outnumbered and outmatched - stand down.

HagSpy_Aggroed_9.speaker: Player
HagSpy_Aggroed_9.text: Tell the hag I'm coming for her.

HagSpy_Aggroed_1.speaker: Player
HagSpy_Aggroed_1.text: Tell Ethel I'm coming for her.

HagSpy_Aggroed_12.speaker: GROUP_Act3_LOW_HagSurvivors_HagSpy
HagSpy_Aggroed_12.text: They want to hurt Auntie - they have the book. I will die before I let anyone touch a hair on her head.

AD_Adrielle_SawHagMaskEquipped_0.speaker: Adrielle
AD_Adrielle_SawHagMaskEquipped_0.text: How can you bear that mask? It stinks of hag magic.
AD_Adrielle_SawHagMaskEquipped_0.context: NodeContext: player has shown up with a hag mask. Little surprised and unnerved

AD_Adrielle_SawHagMaskEquipped_1.speaker: Adrielle
AD_Adrielle_SawHagMaskEquipped_1.text: Kindly remove the mask - it is unpleasant.

AD_SurrogateMother_Connor_2.speaker: Mayrina
AD_SurrogateMother_Connor_2.text: I know, Connor, but just a little longer, all right?

AD_SurrogateMother_Connor_0.speaker: Mayrina
AD_SurrogateMother_Connor_0.text: Ethel will be dead soon, I know it. And then you'll be all better, I know it.

AD_SurrogateMother_Connor_4.speaker: Mayrina
AD_SurrogateMother_Connor_4.text: The hag first, and then we'll find a way to fix you - I promise.

AD_SurrogateMother_Connor_1.speaker: Mayrina
AD_SurrogateMother_Connor_1.text: Careful, Connor - stay close, all right?

AD_SurrogateMother_Connor_6.speaker: Mayrina
AD_SurrogateMother_Connor_6.text: Same as usual? That's... good, I guess.
AD_SurrogateMother_Connor_6.context: NodeContext: sad but trying not to sound it

AD_MaskedVictim1_HagSpyBetrayal_0.speaker: Mask of Regret
AD_MaskedVictim1_HagSpyBetrayal_0.text: I'll know the signs for next time - I won't be fooled by a redcap. Never again.

AD_MaskedVictim1_HagSpyBetrayal_1.speaker: Mask of Regret
AD_MaskedVictim1_HagSpyBetrayal_1.text: That scaly shithead - I can't believe I fell for it.

AD_MaskedVictim1_HagSpyBetrayal_2.speaker: Mask of Regret
AD_MaskedVictim1_HagSpyBetrayal_2.text: Hags really have no bloody shame.

AD_Mayrina_SawHagMaskEquipped_0.speaker: Mayrina
AD_Mayrina_SawHagMaskEquipped_0.text: Do you need to wear that mask? Right now?

AD_Mayrina_SawHagMaskEquipped_1.speaker: Mayrina
AD_Mayrina_SawHagMaskEquipped_1.text: If I were in your shoes, I'd have tossed that mask long ago.

AD_Mayrina_SawHagMaskEquipped_2.speaker: Mayrina
AD_Mayrina_SawHagMaskEquipped_2.text: Why would you keep that wretched thing?
AD_Mayrina_SawHagMaskEquipped_2.context: NodeContext: kinda rolling her eyes, she doesn't get it

AD_SurrogateMother_SeesHusbandAsSummon_1.speaker: Mayrina
AD_SurrogateMother_SeesHusbandAsSummon_1.text: I'm sorry, Connor. I'm so sorry.

AD_SurrogateMother_SeesHusbandAsSummon_2.speaker: Mayrina
AD_SurrogateMother_SeesHusbandAsSummon_2.context: NodeContext: surprise to see him, then calling out, upset

Kleidunn_3.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_3.text: The dragonborn was a redcap! Kled hates redcaps. What if - what if more come?
Kleidunn_3.context: NodeContext: has a phobia of redcaps. Terrified and panicked (the dragon born, his friend, just revealed himself to be working for ethel)

Kleidunn_37.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_37.text: But the hag is angry with us - because of the book!

Kleidunn_1.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_1.text: Kled must get rid of it, but the cleric said it was a hag's 'deepest secret'. But what if the hag finds Kled with it? Oh, no, no.

Kleidunn_47.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_47.text: Slow down - what is this secret?

Kleidunn_24.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_24.text: Will this help me kill Ethel?

Kleidunn_0.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_0.text: Oh, yes! The cleric said something about Ethel and, uh, death. It's in a safe in the back.
Kleidunn_0.context: NodeContext: frusttrated he can't remember the details, speaking quickly

Kleidunn_34.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_34.text: Get it away from Kled - please!

Kleidunn_14.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_14.text: Calm down - where is the hag?

Kleidunn_21.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_21.text: Kled doesn't know, but as long as Kled has the book, the hag will keep hunting.

Kleidunn_27.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_27.text: It's in a safe in the back. Kled doesn't know what it is, only that it's important.
Kleidunn_27.context: NodeContext: frusttrated he can't remember the details, speaking quickly

Kleidunn_11.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_11.text: I'm not getting mixed up in this.

Kleidunn_48.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_48.text: Then run, hide - Kled doesn't care. Just take the book!

Kleidunn_29.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_29.text: He mentioned a book. What was he talking about?

Kleidunn_60.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_60.text: That's right - the book! This is all because of the book!

Kleidunn_36.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_36.text: Breathe - what was he doing here?

Kleidunn_39.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_39.text: Wait - the book! This is all because of the book!

Kleidunn_6.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_6.text: Kled can't believe you killed THE Auntie Ethel. You're amazing.

Kleidunn_8.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_8.context: NodeContext: calmer and more at peacer than we've ever seen kled

Kleidunn_4.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_4.text: The hag is dead, isn't she? Tell Kled the truth.
Kleidunn_4.context: NodeContext: calmer and more at peacer than we've ever seen kled

Kleidunn_7.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_7.text: Hope - it is in Kled's heart. It feels warm and gentle.
Kleidunn_7.context: NodeContext: maybe touching his heart with a soft, serene smile

Kleidunn_12.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_12.text: Kled only wishes Mayrina could feel it too.

Kleidunn_41.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_41.text: Thank you - thank you so much. You are Kled's best friend, for the rest of your life - Kled promises!

Kleidunn_31.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_31.text: Because for the first time in years, Kled doesn't feel scared.
Kleidunn_31.context: NodeContext: a wonderous smile, he hasn't known such peace in years

Kleidunn_26.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_26.text: I tracked nature's perversion to her lair and slew her. Balance is restored.

Kleidunn_17.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_17.text: Jatlo is acting strange. Kled hopes he is all right.

Kleidunn_30.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_30.text: Kled won't let any more redcaps hurt Lady Mayrina - promise.

Kleidunn_38.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_38.text: Is Lady Mayrina all right? Can Kled help? Kled wants Lady Mayrina to be all better.

Kleidunn_22.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_22.text: Have you seen a doll around here?

Kleidunn_25.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_25.text: You - you saw the doll too? It was in the next room - staring. But when Kled looked back, it was gone.

Kleidunn_56.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_56.text: She's just a sheep - she'll be fine.

Kleidunn_15.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_15.text: A hag turned Kled into a rat. Had her redcaps give chase - for hours.

Kleidunn_18.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_18.text: Mayrina is not fine - not even a little. Fix her - please.
Kleidunn_18.context: NodeContext: desperate for mayrina not to suffer the same fate

Kleidunn_33.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_33.text: Any idea how to remove the hex?

Kleidunn_52.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_52.text: No - Kled isn't good at hag magic. Can't help sweet Lady Mayrina.
Kleidunn_52.context: NodeContext: annoyed at himself, he wants to help mayrina desperately and feels useless

Kleidunn_55.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_55.text: You think Mayrina is sweet? I found her more sour, to be honest.

Kleidunn_13.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_13.text: Really? Then maybe it is only Kled she is sweet to...
Kleidunn_13.context: NodeContext: pleased - he has a crush on mayrina

Kleidunn_28.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_28.text: Friends only. Lady Mayrina is too pretty and kind for the likes of Kled.
Kleidunn_28.context: NodeContext: absolutely has a crush on mayrina

Kleidunn_16.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_16.text: But if you can't stop the hex, Kled will take care of her. Feeding, shearing, scratching behind her ears - Kled will do his best.
Kleidunn_16.context: NodeContext: he loves mayrina, sheep form or not, and will do anything he can to take care of her

Kleidunn_72.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_72.text: You should leave while you still can.

Kleidunn_67.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_67.text: Before Kled met Lady Mayrina, Kled never left the house. But Lady Mayrina helped him. Kled is braver now, and doesn't leave friends behind - not ever.

Kleidunn_42.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_42.text: The dragonborn was Kled's friend. Why - why would he hurt Lady Mayrina?
Kleidunn_42.context: NodeContext: confused, upset, doesn't quite understand what happened (dragonborn was secretly a redcap and working for the hag)

Kleidunn_23.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_23.text: He was only pretending to be her friend - it was all a ploy.

Kleidunn_49.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_49.text: But Lady Maryina was kind to him - to us!

Kleidunn_19.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_19.text: Anyone who hurts Lady Mayrina is Kled's enemy. But anyone who helps her is Kled's friend - thank you.

Kleidunn_54.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_54.text: No! She is sweet, and kind, and beautiful - oh. You made a joke, yes? Yes - you saved Lady Mayrina, so you are nice.

Kleidunn_58.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_58.text: You need to do a better job protecting Mayrina.

Kleidunn_9.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_9.text: Redcaps hurt Kled a long time ago. When Kled sees them, he thinks of things - bad things.

Kleidunn_74.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_74.text: But Kled will be brave next time. Thank you, for saving Lady Mayrina.

Kleidunn_43.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_43.text: The redcap can't hurt Kled - it can't hurt Kled.
Kleidunn_43.context: NodeContext: trying desperately to calm down (not working)

Kleidunn_44.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_44.text: Kled helped kill the hag's redcap - she must be so angry. Stop her, please - before she finds Kled!

Kleidunn_46.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_46.context: NodeContext: Freaking out, full on anxiety spiral after a fight with a red cap

Kleidunn_59.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_59.text: Lady - Lady Maryina. Upstairs. Please - please check. Oh, gods.
Kleidunn_59.context: NodeContext: Freaking out, full on anxiety spiral after a fight with a red cap - pulling out long enough to direct the player and the burrying face in hands and freaking out again

Kleidunn_50.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_50.text: Please help Lady Mayrina. She's nice and kind and sweet to Kled - to, uh, everyone.
Kleidunn_50.context: NodeContext: has a crush on mayrina and is trying (and failing) to hide it

Kleidunn_62.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_62.text: Lady Mayrina wants to speak to you - hurry, hurry!

Kleidunn_64.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_64.text: Make the hag go away. Kled can't take any more redcaps. Can't.

Kleidunn_66.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_66.text: Must find the doll -  must find it.
Kleidunn_66.context: NodeContext: trying not to panic and kind of failing (he's terrified of everything related to the hag)

Kleidunn_51.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_51.text: No - no! You don't understand - it watches Kled. Follows Kled! It will kill us all.
Kleidunn_51.context: NodeContext: trying not to panic and kind of failing (he's terrified of everything related to the hag)

Kleidunn_57.speaker: Player
Kleidunn_57.text: Where else have you seen it?

Kleidunn_71.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_71.text: The stairs, the floor, awake, asleep - everywhere.
Kleidunn_71.context: NodeContext: trying not to panic and kind of failing (he's terrified of everything related to the hag)

Kleidunn_68.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_68.text: Looking, looking, where is the doll?!
Kleidunn_68.context: NodeContext: trying not to panic and kind of failing (he's terrified of everything related to the hag)

Kleidunn_69.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_69.text: Kled is sorry, so sorry! Kled thought the dragonborn was a friend. What if - what if more redcaps come?

Kleidunn_70.speaker: Kled
Kleidunn_70.text: The hag - the hag killed sweet Mayrina. Sent the redcap! What does Kled do?!
Kleidunn_70.context: NodeContext: has a phobia of redcaps. Terrified and panicked (the dragon born, his friend, just revealed himself to be working for ethel)

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_7.speaker: Kled
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_7.text: Is it dead? Please tell Kled that it's dead.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_53.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_53.text: That's a dead redcap, all right - ugly bastards.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_35.speaker: Adrielle
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_35.text: It killed itself with no hesitation. Why would it do such a thing?

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_40.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_40.text: It was crying - saying Ethel was dying.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_39.speaker: Player
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_39.text: I killed her - she's not coming back.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_46.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_46.text: Well, I'll bloody be. Should've known if anyone was going to save the day, it'd be you.
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_46.context: NodeContext: delighted to see the player

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_37.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_37.text: Gang - meet the hero who rescued me and my little one from Auntie Ethel - and was then kind enough to finish the job.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_9.speaker: Adrielle
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_9.text: This is the one who dared the depths of a hag lair? It is a pleasure - Mayrina has spoken of you often.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_1.speaker: Player
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_1.text: Mayrina - what are you doing here?

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_54.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_54.text: You hardly expected me to just sit on my backside after you saved me, hm?

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_51.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_51.text: Don't be shy, gang - they're one of the good ones.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_31.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_31.text: We prefer the term 'survivors', thank you very much.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_20.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_20.text: I came to the city, looking for people like me who'd fallen victim to the hag. Sadly, I found plenty.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_45.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_45.text: We were researching hags when Auntie Ethel's redcap found us. Cheers for taking care of the witch - only sad I couldn't see it.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_43.speaker: Player
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_43.text: I didn't do this for you.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_55.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_55.text: Still crabby, I see. Well, you have my gratitude regardless. Thanks - from me and the little one.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_30.speaker: Player
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_30.text: You've grown up a lot since we last met.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_10.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_10.text: Hah! That's a nice way of saying I'm not such a brat - but I appreciate it.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_47.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_47.text: With Ethel gone, maybe I'll finally sleep in peace. Thanks - from me and the little one.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_48.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_48.text: The gang said they'd seen you. Glad you made sure Ethel got what's coming.
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_48.context: NodeContext: delighted to see the player

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_28.speaker: Player
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_28.text: I was happy to kill Ethel.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_29.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_29.text: Good. I'm only sad I couldn't see it myself.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_26.speaker: Player
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_26.text: Glad to see you in human form again. How was life as a sheep?

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_8.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_8.text: Urgh. My mouth tastes like mutton - and everything is so itchy.
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_8.context: NodeContext: a shudder (talking about being turned into a sheep)

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_17.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_17.text: Thankfully with Ethel gone, no one else will know what it's like to shit pellets.
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_17.context: NodeContext: making a joke of her situation

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_24.speaker: Mayrina
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_24.text: Here - a little thank you for killing Ethel, from me and the little one.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_11.speaker: Player
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_11.text: I didn't do it for you.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_42.speaker: Player
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_42.text: Can confirm - that is a dead redcap.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_33.speaker: Adrielle
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_33.text: Indeed - it killed itself with no hesitation. But why?

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_0.speaker: Kled
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_0.text: Kled heard it cry. It said 'Auntie Ethel' - and that she was dying.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_50.speaker: Adrielle
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_50.text: Could it be? Is our tormentor gone? Is Ethel finally dead?

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_49.speaker: Player
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_49.text: I killed her - and she's not coming back.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_34.speaker: Adrielle
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_34.text: By Helm, thank you. We'd been researching hags, and made the mistake of drawing Auntie Ethel's ire.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_6.speaker: Adrielle
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_6.text: Were it not for you, this redcap would have been the end of us. Here - a token for your bravery, though it is but small against such a monumental deed.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_13.speaker: Kled
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_13.text: *Sniff.* You smell weird - like death and, and hag magic!

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_27.speaker: Adrielle
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_27.text: Curious. Few who tangle with a hag survive - as we know too well. We're victims of a hag's cruelty and formed this group to research our tormentors.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_14.speaker: Adrielle
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_14.text: But we drew the ire of Auntie Ethel and she sent this redcap, among other evils, to kill us. Is it true, then? Is the witch dead?

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_12.speaker: Player
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_12.text: Yes - I'm glad you're all safe.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_32.speaker: Adrielle
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_32.text: As am I - it will be a pleasure to sleep with both eyes shut.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_22.speaker: Adrielle
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_22.text: As if I would let you leave with empty pockets.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_5.speaker: Adrielle
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_5.text: Here - a token for your bravery, though it is but small against such a monumental deed.

DisguisedJatloInstaDied_52.speaker: Adrielle
DisguisedJatloInstaDied_52.text: Dealing with a hag can leave one a touch paranoid - I do not blame you for keeping secrets. Nevertheless, thank you.

AD_Combat_SurrogateMother_JatloDied_0.speaker: Mayrina
AD_Combat_SurrogateMother_JatloDied_0.context: NodeContext: bitter angry - someone she thought was a friend has just died in combat

AD_SurvivorsSeeHagSpyInstaDie_5.speaker: Adrielle
AD_SurvivorsSeeHagSpyInstaDie_5.context: NodeContext: shock, jatlo (who you thought was a friend) has just collapses in front of you

AD_SurvivorsSeeHagSpyInstaDie_1.speaker: Kled
AD_SurvivorsSeeHagSpyInstaDie_1.text: Wait - that's a redcap. Kled hates redcaps!

AD_SurvivorsSeeHagSpyInstaDie_4.speaker: Mask of Regret
AD_SurvivorsSeeHagSpyInstaDie_4.context: NodeContext: realises her friend was a traitor

AD_SurvivorsSeeHagSpyInstaDie_3.speaker: Adrielle
AD_SurvivorsSeeHagSpyInstaDie_3.text: A traitor - I should have known.
AD_SurvivorsSeeHagSpyInstaDie_3.context: NodeContext: angry at herself for not seeing it
